com.jcabi.log

Class VerboseProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jcabi.log.VerboseProcess

  • public final class VerboseProcess
extends Object
    Utility class for getting stdout from a running process and logging it through SLF4J.

    For example: 

     String name = new VerboseProcess(
   new ProcessBuilder("who", "am", "i")
 ).stdout();

    The class throws an exception if the process returns a non-zero exit code.

    The class is immutable and thread-safe.

    Since:
    0.5
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VerboseProcess(Process prc)
      Public ctor.
      VerboseProcess(ProcessBuilder builder)
      Public ctor (builder will be configured to redirect error stream to the stdout and will receive an empty stdin).

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      String stdout()
      Get stdout from the process, after its finish (the method will wait for the process and log its output).
